mapper.select: select max(regdate) as day, count(userid) as dayofAccount from tbl_member tm natural join tbl_member_auth tma where tma.auth not like 'ROLE_ADMIN' group by regdate order by regdate
select * from ( select sum(res_table.price) as price, resdate from res_table where res_table.userid=#{userid} group by resdate ) A
